SA15bsa0552u:4: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti /
SA15bsa0552u:5: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayituṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:8: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
SA15bsa0552u:15: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ padārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati;
SA15bsa0552u:19: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasidvasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa vāsidvasambhāvanāpi //
SA15bsa0552u:28: sambhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasidveralaṃ sattānumāneneti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:31: tathā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇe tāvat ekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:32: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi kiṃ tāme vārthakriyāṃ kuryādanyāṃ vā, navā kāmapi kriyāmiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:35: yadā ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryyaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kāryye śakto 'śakto vā /
SA15bsa0552u:36: yadi śaktastadā varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt tatrāpi śaktatvāt śaktasya kṣepāyogāt /
SA15bsa0552u:39: athāśaktastadā ekatra kāryye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:41: yadā hi śaktasya svabhāvasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrītsāritamakaraṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:43: tasmād yad yadā yajjananavyavahārapātraṃ, tattadā tat kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:45: tadevamekatra kāryye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedāt ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam /
SA15bsa0552u:50_1: sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ sidvatvāt asidvistāvadasambhavinī /
SA15bsa0552u:53: sākṣādajanake 'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet /
SA15bsa0552u:56: tatra yatpāramārthikam jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:57: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthita vījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvāt aupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte sambhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa0552u:64: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvvasya sarvvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:66: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivarttamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisidveranavadyo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:67: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryyakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe ca atītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyaṃ janayati /
SA15bsa0552u:72: tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyaṃ yathā śālyaṅkuramakurvvan kodravaḥ śālyaṅkure /
SA15bsa0552u:73: na karoti caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryyakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikāryyamiti vyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam /
SA15bsa0552u:76: na cānaikāntikatā pūrvvoktena nyāyena samartha vyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayovidhibhūtayoḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:77: yatpunaratroktaṃ yadyadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:84: na cātrapakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryyāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:86: kāraṇatvasamarthavyavahāragocaratvayośca bṛkṣaśiṃśapayoriva vyāvṛttibhedo 'stītyanavasara eva evaṃvidhasya kṣudrapralāpasya /
SA15bsa0552u:87: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:91: dṛṣṭāntamātra eva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyyayābhyāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāt nanvābhyāmeva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirastviti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:93: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayatītyā dikamupanyasituṃ analasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:94_0: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa ttvekatradharmmiṇi yadyadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ
SA15bsa0552u:95_1: samarthetarasvabhāvavirudvadharmmā dhyāsāt bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgatayā sapakṣatāmāvahati
SA15bsa0552u:97: atraiva sādharmmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0552u:98: nanu viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalābdyāptisiddhistasya copanyāsavārttāpi nāsti tatkathaṃ vyāptiḥ prasādhiteti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:100_1: 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisambhave tadānīmevaitat karaṇamakaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā
SA15bsa0552u:100_2: pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:101: nanvevaṃ anvayamātramastu vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyamiti cet, vyāptisiddhereva /
SA15bsa0552u:103: na dvividhā hi vyāptisiddhiranvayarūpā ca karttṛdharmmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:105: vyatirekarūpā ca karmmadharmmaḥ sādhyābhāve sādhanasyāvaśyamabhāvo yaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:109: yathā viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe anvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi paścātparigalati /
SA15bsa0552u:111: tathā prasaṅgatadviparyyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścātparigalatyeva /
SA15bsa0552u:114_0: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ tadevaṃ viparyyayabādhakapramāṇamantareṇāpi
SA15bsa0552u:115: nanu ca sādhanamidamasidvaṃ, na hi kāraṇabudhyā kāryyaṃ gṛhyate /
SA15bsa0552u:120: na ca pūrvvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātāsti kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
SA15bsa0552u:122: na ca pūrbbotarakālayoḥ sambittī tābhyāṃ vāsanā tayā ca hetuphalāvasāyī vikalpa iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:123: sa hi vikalpo gṛhītānusandhāyako 'tadrūpasamāropako vā na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:129: tathā hi vījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ vījādijñānāt kāryyādaṅkurādervā niścetavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:137: tadasaṅgatam, satyapi kāryyatvasattvayorvyāvṛttibhede sattvasidvau kutaḥ kāryyatvasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:140: tataśca sāmarthyasandehe bhavatītyeva vaktumaśakyaṃ kathamabhūtvābhāvitvaṃ kāryyatvaṃ setsyati /
SA15bsa0552u:141: apekṣitaparavyāpāratvaṃ kāryyatvamityapi nāsato dharmmaḥ sattvañca sāmarthyaṃ tacca sandigdhamiti kutaḥ kāryyasiddhiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:142: tadasidvau pūrvvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsidvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:144: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvat ajātasyānanvayanirudvasya vā kāryyārambhakatvaṃ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:145: na ca nispannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryyāya vyāpāryyet /
SA15bsa0552u:151: sarvvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye virudvatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:157: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tat pratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam /
SA15bsa0552u:159: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravartteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyate /
SA15bsa0552u:162: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā virudvaṃ vaktumucitaṃ,
SA15bsa0552u:165: tathāhi kāraṇajñānopādeyabhūtena kāryyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva iti anvayaniścayo janyate,
SA15bsa0552u:166_1: jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbhaṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate / yadāhurguravaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:176: kintu yatra pramāṇapratīte vījādau vastubhūte dharmmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthya tatra kṣaṇābhaṅga sādhanāya /
SA15bsa0552u:178: anyathā na kvacidapi vastumātrasyāpi pratipattiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:179: tasmācchāstrīyasattvalakṣaṇasandehe 'pi paṭupratyakṣavalāvalambitavastubhāve aṅkurādau kāryyatvamupalabhyamānaṃ vījādeḥ sāmarthyamupasthāpayatīti nāsidvidoṣāvakāśaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:186: adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanāt vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasidviriti kva virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:187: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve api anyanivṛttī na vastunī svalakṣaṇāvagāhitve abhilāpasaṃsargānupapatteriti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:199: yathā sarvvasyāsattve 'pi vījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ dṛṣṭasya niyatahetuphalabhāvasya pratikṣeptumaśakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:200: paraṃ vāhyenārthena sati pratibandhe prāmāṇyamanyathātvaprāmāṇyamiti viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:202: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto 'sambhavepyatadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt /
SA15bsa0552u:203: dvividho hi pratyakṣasya viṣayo grāhyo 'dhyavaseyaśca sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt /
SA15bsa0552u:217: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:219: yadvā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭātmako deśakālāntarabartī atadrūpaparāvṛttaḥ sarvvo viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:220: na prathamaḥ pakṣo 'nanugāmittvāt; nāpi dvitīyaḥ, adṛṣṭatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:226: anyathā ghaṭo 'pi ghaṭasantāno 'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyet sarvvātmanā grahaṇābhāvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:228: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu /
SA15bsa0552u:229: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatve sādhanasya virudvatvaṃ syāt iti na kaścidvirodhaprabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:232: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyyayahetudvayavalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyettadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisidveranaikāntikatvaṃ na syāditi yuktam /
SA15bsa0552u:234: tathāhi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramisahakāryyapekṣayā kramikāryyaṃ kariṣyati /
SA15bsa0552u:235: na caitad vaktavyaṃ samartho 'rthaḥ svarūpeṇa karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:236: svarūpañca sarvvadāstītyanupakāriṇi sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti,
SA15bsa0552u:239: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:241: tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:245: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe 'kṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurbbāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:246: na ca so 'pyakṣepakriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvādbhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:249: tasmādyadrūpamādāya svarūpeṇāpi janayatītyucyate; tasya prāgapi bhāve kathamajaniḥ kadācit /
SA15bsa0552u:250: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryyasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:251: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ karttā syāt yuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:252: kintu sāmagrī janikā tataḥ sahakāryyantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryyaprasava iti kimatra virudvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:253: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇakarotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0552u:259: yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamepāmastu ko niṣedvā?
SA15bsa0552u:260: militaireva tu tatkāryya karttavyamiti kuto labhyate?
SA15bsa0552u:263: tasmāt sāmagrī janika naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:265: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭādbhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
SA15bsa0552u:266: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatti rna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryyotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
SA15bsa0552u:267: na ca pratyabhijñādibalādekatvasidviḥ tat pauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśanakhādāvapyupalambhato nirddalanāt,
SA15bsa0552u:271: vyāptau tu sākṣātparamparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake 'yogavyavacchedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:274: tatsvabhāve ca vyāpye 'nyayogavyavacchedo vikalpāruḍharūpāpekṣayā vyāptau dvividhamavadhāraṃam /
SA15bsa0552u:275: nanu yadi pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvvadājanakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāttadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate /
SA15bsa0552u:276: na kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:279: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvvakālabhāvī /
SA15bsa0552u:280: pūrvvakālabhāvī vā yo 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī,
SA15bsa0552u:282: tathā ca sati sidvayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope sidvameva jananamajananambāsajyata iti /
SA15bsa0552u:285_0: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthya nijamāgantukañca sahakāryyantaraṃ tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat
SA15bsa0552u:285_1: sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryyanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:288: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ arthakriyādharmmakamavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamugdīritaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:290: yattu kāryyeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣanta ityupatkṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:291: yadi hi kāryyameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syādyuktametat /
SA15bsa0552u:294: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvvathāsamarthāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:296: atha kāryyasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:297: na tattarhi tat kāryyaṃ svātantryāt / yadbhāṣyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:303: yadi hi svayambhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryyaṃ tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:304: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kāryyasvātantryānna bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:305: tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryyeta / yadbhāṣyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:308: tasmād yathaiva tadbhāve niyamena na bhavati /
SA15bsa0552u:314: yo hṛttarakāryyajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:315: na tarhi tatkāryyakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikamapi karotīti /
SA15bsa0552u:317: sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasya uttarakālamevedaṃ kāryyaṃ na pūrvvakālamiti kuta etat /
SA15bsa0552u:319: kiṃ kurmmaḥ uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet;
SA15bsa0552u:321: sthiṣtvepyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:323: dhūmādagnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
SA15bsa0552u:324: tasmāt pramāṇasidve svabhāvāvalambanaṃ, na tu svabhāvāvalambanena pramāṇavyālopaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:330: uttarakāryyajananavyavahāragocaratvañca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryyakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmmiṇi sidvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:331: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasya kāryyasya prathame kṣaṇe 'sambhavādeva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate /
SA15bsa0552u:332: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasambhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodhonāma /
SA15bsa0552u:337: tathāhi bījamaṅkurādikaṃ kurvvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikantadākṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:338: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhāvau parasparavirudvau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
SA15bsa0552u:344: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ garddabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api virudvau dharmau /
SA15bsa0552u:346: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirvirudvadharmmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
SA15bsa0552u:349: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:350: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatradharmmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:351: tadatraikaḥ svbhāvaḥ svābhāvena virudvo yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
SA15bsa0552u:357: tadyadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāri ṇāvapi svabhāvāvavirudvo tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vā viṣayabhedādavirudve,
SA15bsa0552u:361: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryyaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādavirudve śaktayaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryye kālabhedādapyavirudve /
SA15bsa0552u:362: yathāpūrvvaṃ nniḥkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:364: na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kāryye deśabhedādavirudve śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:374: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavadvā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:375: tadatraikadharmmiṇi tat kālakāryyakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryyākāritvasyānyakāryyakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:376: tathā hi yatraiva dharmmiṇi tatkālakāryyakāritvamupalabdhanna tatraiva kālāntare tat kāryyākāritvamanyakāryyakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃharttuṃ śakyate,
SA15bsa0552u:381: ata eva vajro 'pi pakṣakūkṣau nikṣiptaḥ kathamasau sphaṭiko varākaḥ kālabhedenābhedāsādhanāya dṛṣṭāntībhavitumarhati /
SA15bsa0552u:382: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryyāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmmibhedo yukto bhedasādhakapramāṇābhāvādindriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācca /
SA15bsa0552u:383: iti na kālabhede 'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:390: tathāhyupasapaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro vījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvvasmādeva puñjāt samarthojāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate /
SA15bsa0552u:391: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu vijasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva vījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati bījakṣaṇānnānye vījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥpātinaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:392: nahyupasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavarttināṃ vījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:393: athopasarpaṇāt prāṅna tat santāna varttino 'pi janayanti paramparayāpyaṅkurotpādānuguṇaṃ vījakṣaṇaṃ vījamātrajananātteṣāṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:395: hanta tarhi yadabhāve satyutpannopi na janayedeva /
SA15bsa0552u:396: tathā kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasambhavādādyātiśayotpādamaṅkuraṃ vā prati kṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmakenāpi svīkarttavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:400: api cāntyo vījakṣaṇo 'napekṣo 'ṅkurādikaṃ kurvvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:403: tathā hi vījasyāṅkuraṃ pratyupādānatvaṃ kṣityādikaṃ tu prati sahakāritvaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:408: abhede vā kathaṃ vījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt /
SA15bsa0552u:411: kśityādau janayitavye tadupādānam purvvameva kṣityādivījasya rūpāntaramiti /
SA15bsa0552u:415: na ca kṣaṇasyopakārasambhavo 'nyatra jananāt tasyābhedyatvādityanekatvamapi nāstīti dvitīyo 'pi vyāpakābhāvo na sidvaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:417: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo 'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryyeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvāt sahakaraṇācca /
SA15bsa0552u:419: kariṣyate ca kramavat sahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryyāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasidveḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:424: atha pūrvvāvasthitasyaiva vījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha sambhūyakaraṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:430: atha tadvā tādṛgvā āsīditi na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:431: tatastādṛksvabhāvasambhavepyakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
SA15bsa0552u:434: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavarttiṣu vījakṣaṇeṣu sarvveṣveva sambhavī kintu keṣucideva karmmakarakara pallavasahacareṣu /
SA15bsa0552u:435: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilabanādipūrvvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvvāṇyeva vījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante,
SA15bsa0552u:438: kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvvatra kāryye dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭañca sarvvāstikaprasidvametat /
SA15bsa0552u:440: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva vījakṣaṇānāṃ yena taeva vījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkurambā paramparayā janayeyu rnānye vījakṣaṇāḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:447: pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhedabhinnānyakālakṣaṇādbhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstyasau jitvaraḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:449: sāmagrī tu na sarvvathekṣaṇasahā kāryyantu mānānugamamiti //
SA15bsa0552u:450: tadevaṃ nopakāro 'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣyaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:452: tadā yadi pūrvvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
SA15bsa0552u:457: yacca vījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryyabhede 'pi kāryyasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0552u:461: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryyābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretaṃ sāmagrīsajātīyatve na kāryyavijātīyatetyarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:462: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryyaṃ na karttavyaṃ nāma /
SA15bsa0552u:465: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdhaṃ yena tatrāpi bhedaśaṅkā syāt /
SA15bsa0552u:470: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasidvau na kṣaṇikāt sattvannivarttata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:471: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ /
SA15bsa0552u:474: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyyayayoḥ sattve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvamataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviriti sthitam //
